enabled.comment: Please remember to save the configuration when enabling and disabling this extension.
enabled.label: Enabled

username.comment: Your API username provided by Communicator.

password.comment:
Your API password provided by Communicator.
The password is encrypted using the encryption key within the configuration before being persisted to the database.
password.label: Password

test_button.comment: The test connection button uses the username and password stored in the database to ensure that it can connect to Communicator. When changing your credentials, please save the configuration before testing the connection.
test_button.label: Test

custom_frequency.comment: By default, existing data is synchronised every five minutes.
custom_frequency.label: Synchronisation Frequency

custom_day.comment: The day of the week that the synchronisation should occur.
custom_day.label: Synchronisation Day

subscriber.comment: The subscriber events will synchronise newsletter subscribers to the contact table.
subscriber.label: Subscribers

customer.comment: The customer events will synchronise customers to the contact table.
customer.label: Customers

interval.comment: The number of minutes between the customer leaving the website and receiving the abandoned basket notification.
interval.label: Interval
